mapper.select:
select a.id, a.source_dept_id as sourceDeptId, a.visit_id as visitId, a.bfc_id as bfcId, a.item_id as itemId, a.item_name as name, a.cost_time as costTime, a.hosp_code, a.price as price, a.total_num_unit_code as numUnitCode, a.crte_name as crteName, a.total_num as num, a.total_price as valuationPrice, a.preferential_price as preferentialPrice, a.reality_price as realityPrice, ( select name from base_dept where id = a.source_dept_id and hosp_code = #{hospCode} ) as sourceDeptName, a.item_code as itemCode from inpt_cost a where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.item_code = #{itemCode} and a.visit_id = #{visitId} and a.item_id = #{itemId} and a.status_code = '0'
and a.source_dept_id = #{sourceDeptId}
and (a.iat_id is not null or a.iat_id != '')
and (a.iat_id is null or a.iat_id = '')
and attribution_code = #{attributionCode}
and (attribution_code = '0' or attribution_code is null or attribution_code = '') and a.id not in (select insure.cost_id from insure_individual_cost insure join insure_item_match iia on iia.insure_item_code = insure.item_code and iia.hosp_code = insure.hosp_code and iia.item_id = #{itemId} where insure.visit_id = #{visitId} and insure.hosp_code = #{hospCode})
order by a.cost_time asc
